#summary LDAP-server

|| <[Inst_S_Core Core] || [TOC TOC] || [Inst_S_LDAP_PAM PAM]> ||

= LDAP-server ==

== Packages ==

 * openldap-servers
 * openldap-clients

== Configs and data ==

configs:
 * /etc/ldap.conf
 * /etc/openldap/slapd.conf
data:
 * /var/lib/ldap

== Setting up ==

=== Make configs ===

 # generate password:
   {{{
[root]# slappasswd -h '{SMD5}' -s secred
}}}
  result:
   {SMD5}byYxFQWSBfC/VJKooDQuMZUyq1g=
 # /etc/openldap/slapd.conf:
  {{{
access to *
        by self write
        by users read
        by anonymous auth
database      dbm
suffix        "dc=ldap"
rootdn        "cn=odmin,dc=ldap"
rootpw        {SMD5}byYxFQWSBfC/VJKooDQuMZUyq1g=
}}}
 # /etc/openldap/ldap.conf
  not need
 # /var/lib/ldap/DB_CONFIG
  ldbm: not need
  bdb: {{{cp /etc/openldap/DB_CONFIG.example /var/lib/ldap/DB_CONFIG}}}

== Start ==

{{{
chown :ldap /etc/openldap/slapd.conf (or check permissions)
chmod g+r /etc/openldap/slapd.conf (or check permissions)
chkconfig ldap on
service ldap start
}}}

*Important*: set ldap start order _after_ network but _befor_ named:
{{{ mv /etc/rc.d/rc3.d/S27ldap /etc/rc.d/rc3.d/S12ldap }}}

=== Fill w/ data ===

 # make Root.ldif
  {{{
dn: dc=ldap
objectClass: dcObject
objectClass: organization
dc: ldap
o: Contora, Ltd.
}}}
 # and:
  {{{ldapadd -x -D "cn=odmin,dc=ldap" -w secred -h localhost -p 389 -f Root.ldif}}}
